allow: Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root --port=3308 -e "SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM drives WHERE drive_id = 599" admin_placement_db)
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root --port=3308 -e "SELECT COUNT(*) as count, class FROM students WHERE batch = ''2025-2026'' GROUP BY class" admin_placement_db)
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root --port=3308 -e "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM students WHERE batch = ''2025-2026'' LIMIT 5" admin_placement_db)
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root --port=3308 -e "SELECT s.student_id, s.upid, s.student_name, s.class FROM students s WHERE 1=1 LIMIT 5" admin_placement_db)

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root --port=3308 -e "SELECT upid, student_name, program, course FROM students WHERE offer_type = ''Internship'' OR offer_type IS NULL LIMIT 5" admin_placement_db)
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root --port=3308 -e "SELECT place_id, student_id, upid, drive_no, company_name FROM placed_students WHERE student_id IN (3916, 3913, 3914)" admin_placement_db)
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root --port=3308 -e "SHOW COLUMNS FROM placed_students LIKE ''percentage''" admin_placement_db)
